channel.title: Coursera on Yuhao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Coursera on Yuhao's Blog

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Machine Learning Ref: https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning Mimic human learning process of generating output based on specified inputs, like a turning machine Supervised Machine Learning Regression and Classification Linear regression logistic regression gradient descent Neural Network prob: high training error - high bias sol: consider more features -> use larger neural network prob: high correlation error - high variance sol: cut weights of some features -> use more data Understanding comes from talent & intelligence, Deduction comes from learning & experience
